title: Top Dem Albright Says She’ll Convert to Islam if Muslims Forced to Register
text:
UH-OH: Megyn Gets Bad News at NBC… Bet She Wishes She Hadn’t Left Fox Now 
“Yesterday, I tweeted about my own background,” she wrote. “I was raised a Catholic, married an Episcopalian and then found out I was Jewish. I said in my tweet that should a registry of Muslims be instituted by this administration, I would add my name to such a list.” 
“Such a registry is not included in the language of this order, but by targeting Muslim-majority countries for immigration bans and by expressing a clear preference for refugees who are religious minorities, there’s no question this order is biased against Muslims,” Albright continued. 
You can read her rant here, if you have a high tolerance for holier-than-thou posturing from a formerly relevant political figure: 
Of coursee, the chances that President Trump cares about Albright’s words are about the same that Conservative Tribune’s readers do — slim to none. 
While America is a nation built on immigrants, it is also crucial that we keep our people safe. The president is simply trying to protect the United States. 
And if Albright has to make up stuff to protest, you know she doesn’t have much of an argument in the first place.
